text:
Unidentified persons burgled a house at Lalgudi when the inmates were away a couple of days ago and took away with 16 sovereigns of gold jewellery during the late hours on Saturday and the early hours on Sunday. The house owner N. Sundarrajan – the complainant – locked the house and went to his relative’s place at Srirangam along with his family when the culprits struck.

Upon return on Sunday, he found the front door broken open and the valuables stolen from the bureau. Bangles, bracelet, gold ring and a stud were among the gold jewels stolen.
title: House burgled
